name: avoid the ghosts
description:
a simple game about avoiding ghosts with your only light source,  candle.

space bar to light the candle. ghosts within range will disappear after lighting them more than four times.

this game is roughly based off this post from reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/gameideas/comments/p3x3y5/an_rougelike_where_you_need_t...
